text: Lucas Neff (born November 7, 1985) is an American actor. He is best known for his lead role in the Fox sitcom Raising Hope, and starred on the CBS sitcom Carol's Second Act. Neff was born and raised in the Andersonville area of Chicago, Illinois. He is of Irish and Jewish descent. == Other websites == * Category:1985 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Living people
title: Lucas Neff
